page.description: Specify the animation method for Card transitions. For example, when a docked Panel is either shown or hidden.

discussion.p: The following Animation options are available:

item.name: slide
item.description: Panel is animated into view using a slide transition using it's current position in the navigator relative to other Panels. If the Panel Navigator is a top-to-bottom or bottom-to-top layout, Panels will slide into view from the top or bottom. If the Panel Navigator is a left-to-right or right-to-left layout, Panels will slide into view from the left or right.

item.name: fade
item.description: Panel is animated into view using a fade transition.

item.name: slide-right
item.description: Panel is animated into view using the slide animation from left-to-right.

item.name: slide-left
item.description: Panel is animated into view using the slide animation from right-to-left.

item.name: slide-up
item.description: Panel is animated into view using the slide animation from bottom-to-top.

item.name: slide-down
item.description: Panel is animated into view using the slide animation from top-to-bottom.
